steps.name: Action Test Step 1 : Set Vendor simulator to fail (MTNNG ERROR ERROR_INV_MSISDN)
Action Test Step 2 : Wait 5 seconds for simulator to run
Action Test Step 3 : Execute Fin Terms Calculate REST Request
Action Test Step 4 : Execute Transact V4 REST Request
Step.1 --> Financial Terms Calculate response assertions --> Validate clientId field exists (not empty)
Step.2 --> Financial Terms Calculate response assertions --> Validate clientId field exists (not null)
Step.3 --> Financial Terms Calculate response assertions --> Validate clientId field is correct
Step.4 --> Financial Terms Calculate response assertions --> Validate productId field is correct
Step.5 --> Financial Terms Calculate response assertions --> Validate purchaseAmount field is correct
Step.6 --> Transact V4 REST response assertions --> Validate responseCode field is correct
Step.7 --> Transact V4 REST response assertions --> Validate responseMessage field is correct
Step.8 --> Transact V4 REST response assertions --> Validate raasTxnRef field exists
Step.9 --> Transact V4 REST response assertions --> Validate HTTPResponseCode is correct
Action Test Step 5 : Wait 5 seconds before executing CTX DB Assertions
Step.10 --> CTX DB assertions --> Table: cpgtx.tran_log --> Validate transactionResponseCode field is correct
